duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the workflow of a high-volume Accounts Payable department, including hands-on day-to-day processing of vendor invoices, payments, credit cards, and employee reimbursement.
Lead a team of AP Coordinators and Interns, maintain accurate financial records, generate month-end close reports, and handle other duties or special projects as required.
Interact and communicate effectively with Attorneys, follow up on pending issues, and meet deadlines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
